mapper.select: SELECT s.s_name, o.sd_number, o.s_number, m.m_name, o.go_number FROM member m, gym_order o, gym_review r, g_s s WHERE m.m_number = o.m_number AND s.g_id = o.g_id AND s.s_number = o.s_number AND r.g_id(+) = o.g_id AND r.s_number(+) = o.s_number AND r.m_number(+) = o.m_number AND r.go_number(+) = o.go_number AND o.m_number = #{m_number} AND o.g_id = #{g_id} AND r.go_number IS NULL
select * from gym_review r, member m where r.m_number = m.m_number and g_id = #{g_id} order by review_regdate desc
